Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.abstract: The command full usage string containg the full name of the command (that contain the parents)

Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.abstract: The alias used to call the command

Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.name: localFlags
Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.abstract: The command local flags. These are the flags that the command defines.

Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.name: globalFlags
Structs/CommandHelp.html#/s:5Guaka11Comm.abstract: The command global flags. These are the flags the command inherited from its parents.

Protocols/HelpGenerator.html#/s:5Guaka13.abstract: Return command description section to be printed for when the command help is printed.

Protocols/HelpGenerator.html#/s:5Guaka13.name: usageSection
Protocols/HelpGenerator.html#/s:5Guaka13.abstract: Return the usage secion to be printed for when the command help is printed.

Protocols/HelpGenerator.html#/s:5Guaka13.abstract: Return the aliases section to be printed for when the command help is printed.

Protocols/HelpGenerator.html#/s:5Guaka13.abstract: Return the example section to be printed for when the command help is printed.

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC6.name: preRun
Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC6.abstract: After the parsing matches the subcommand, preRun is executed before exacuting run

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC1.abstract: After the parsing matches the subcommand, preRun is executed before exacuting run

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC3.name: run
Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC3.abstract: After the parsing matches the subcommand, run is called after preRun

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC7.abstract: After the parsing matches the subcommand, postRun is called after run

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC1.name: inheritablePostRun
Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC1.abstract: After the parsing matches the subcommand, postRun is called after run

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC1.abstract: Get the help message for the command

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC4.abstract: Fail, print the help message and exit the application

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC7.abstract: Execute a command passing all the command line arguments received

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC7.abstract: Executes a command with a list of arguments

Classes/Command.html#/s:5Guaka7CommandC1.abstract: Get the actual command to execute based on the current command and the arguments passed

Classes/Command.html.abstract: Command class representing a Command that can be executed.
